name: A game without chance
description:
- GMTK Gamejam 2022 Submission -

A game without chance is a logic-based puzzle game where you navigate the world by rolling your dice. Open the doors by standing on the dice panels with the corresponding number facing up. Can you solve all of the puzzles?

Controls:

  • Use WASD or the arrow keys to move
  • Use escape to pause the game
  • Use the R key to reload the level (in case you get stuck)

(Be sure to rate the game if you enjoyed it)
